p: Extract SC was dissolved in olive oil in a concentration of 1% (SC1) and 5% (SC5). The SD was dissolved under sonication in water (1% (SD1) and 5% (SD5)), and filtered through A 0.45 mm membrane filter. The resulting solutions were kept refrigerated at a temperature of 4 Â°C. The extracts were administered intraperitoneally (i.p.).
